title: The Coffee Machine Catastrophe
setting: Belmont Insurance Group, kitchen, Monday 8:30 AM
premise: The brand-new espresso machine was found filled with dish soap, ruining it completely. The soap was added sometime between Friday 5 PM close and Monday 7 AM open.

suspects.name: Patty Novak
suspects.motive: Campaigned for a different coffee machine model and lost the vote
suspects.alibi: I wasn't in the office all weekend. I drove up to Lake Marion on Friday evening for a camping trip with my husband. We got back Sunday night.

suspects.name: Andre Williams
suspects.motive: Angry that only managers get to use the espresso machine
suspects.alibi: I came in Saturday morning at 9 AM to sort a backlog of packages. I worked in the mailroom until noon and then left. I never went near the kitchen.

suspects.name: Sonia Patel
suspects.motive: Thought the machine was an unnecessary expense and voted against purchasing it
suspects.alibi: I was home all weekend with a bad cold. My neighbor brought me soup on Saturday afternoon and can confirm I was in bed. I didn't leave the house.

suspects.name: Jake Ellison
suspects.motive: Lost a bet with coworkers and was dared to pull a prank
suspects.alibi: I came in Sunday around 2 PM to grab a client folder I forgot on Friday. I was in and out in ten minutes. I went straight to my desk and then left.

clues.title: Building Entry Log
clues.content: Weekend badge swipes show Andre entered Saturday at 9:02 AM and left at 12:15 PM. Jake entered Sunday at 2:08 PM and left at 2:22 PM. No other entries recorded.

clues.title: Weekend Security Camera
clues.content: The hallway camera near the kitchen shows one person walking toward the kitchen at 9:35 AM on Saturday. The mailroom is in the opposite direction from the kitchen.

clues.title: Lake Marion Road Closure
clues.content: The only road to Lake Marion was closed all weekend for bridge repairs starting Friday at noon. The closure was announced on the county website Thursday.
